name: GD4 Group 17
description:
This level was made for a level design assignment in a university course. The main idea was to convey a story and a certain mood though level design, without relying on text, speech or symbols.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Dash (can dash through objects)
Use the mouse to look around
